text: María Paula Elizondo Herrera (born 30 November 1998) is a Costa Rican footballer who plays as a defender for Deportivo Saprissa and the Costa Rica women's national team. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Women's association football defenders Category:Costa Rican women's footballers Category:People from Cartago Province Category:Costa Rica women's international footballers Category:Pan American Games bronze medalists for Costa Rica Category:Pan American Games medalists in football Category:Footballers at the 2019 Pan American Games Category:Deportivo Saprissa players
title: María Paula Elizondo
